note:
He/him. Lover of Metal, gamer, and music producer from Bielefeld, Germany. Member of Nexus e. V., a club dedicated to fantasy culture. Part of PESA, a Germany-wide association of members of NEXUS for the promotion of DIY and adventure game culture. Mainly prints minis nowadays, plays Warhammer/OPR (Age of Fantasy, Grimdark Future), Classic Traveller, and D&D (my homebrew ruleset derived from AD&D and 3e). Also lots of FPS and CRPG.
Produces electronic music and Death Metal.
